ValidationRule.description: Placeholder DAC SOS codes were used for data migration but should no longer be selectable.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(DAC_Code__r.Name = "Placeholder DAC Code", SOS_Code__r.Name = "Placeholder SOS Code")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Placeholder DAC/SOS are no longer valid and cannot be selected. Please select a valid DAC or SOS code.
